metadata.title: CVE-2014-9796 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: app/aboot/aboot.c in the Qualcomm components in Android before 2016-07-05on Nexus 5 and 7 (2013) devices does not validate the page size in thekernel header, which allows attackers to bypass intended accessrestrictions via a crafted boot image, aka Android internal bug 28820722and Qualcomm internal bug CR684756.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
